0.text: Innate:  Valor marks enemies hit by  Blinding Assault,  Skystrike or targeted by  Vault as Vulnerable,  revealing them for 4 seconds. If no Vulnerable target exists for 1 second,  Valor automatically marks a nearby visible enemy, but is not able to do so again for 8 − 2.93 (based on critical strike chance) seconds after the mark has timed out, was consumed or was overwritten by another mark.

1.text: Quinn's next basic attack  on-hit against a Vulnerable target consumes the mark to deal 10 − 95 (based on level) (+ 16% − 50% (based on level) AD) bonus physical damage.

2.text: While  Behind Enemy Lines is active, Harrier is disabled and all Vulnerable marks are removed.

0.text: Active: Quinn signals  Valor to fly forward in a line in the target direction, stopping upon colliding with an enemy unit, dealing physical damage to them and all nearby enemies and applying  nearsight to the primary target for 1.75 seconds.

1.text: Non-champion primary targets are  disarmed instead for the same duration.

0.text: Passive: Consuming a  Vulnerable mark grants Quinn  bonus attack speed and  bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

1.text: Active: Quinn orders  Valor to grant  sight of the surrounding area for 2 seconds and  reveal enemy champions within for the same duration.

0.text: Active: Quinn  dashes to the target enemy unit, and upon arrival she  knocks them back, deals them physical damage, and  slows them by 50% which decays over 1.5 seconds, after which she immediately  leaps back, landing 525 units away from them.

Active: Quinn  channels for 2 seconds, signaling  Valor to pair up. Upon completion, he picks her up and they unite, increasing her  total movement speed, granting her  ghosting, and allowing her to cast  Skystrike. Behind Enemy Lines can be recast after 0.5 seconds during the channel.

1.text: Taking damage from non- minions while Behind Enemy Lines is active or while Quinn is  channeling causes her to lose the bonus movement speed for 3 seconds. Becoming  immobilized,  grounded, or  silenced ends Behind Enemy Lines immediately and puts it on  cooldown without performing  Skystrike.

2.text: Once Behind Enemy Lines has been learned, respawning or returning to the summoning platform will spawn  Valor instantly, but  Skystrike is disabled for 2.5 seconds upon uniting.

3.text: Recast: Quinn cancels the channel, placing Behind Enemy Lines on cooldown.

0.text: Active: Quinn detaches from  Valor, ending  Behind Enemy Lines' effects, and rains down a flurry of arrows at the nearby area, dealing 40% AD physical damage to all surrounding enemies.

1.text: Declaring a basic attack or casting  Blinding Assault or  Vault during  Behind Enemy Lines automatically activates Skystrike.

1.concerningText: Active: Quinn signals  Valor to fly forward in a line in the target direction, stopping upon colliding with an enemy unit, dealing physical damage to them and all nearby enemies and applying  nearsight to the primary target for 1.75 seconds.

2.concerningText: Passive: Consuming a  Vulnerable mark grants Quinn  bonus attack speed and  bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

3.concerningText: Active: Quinn  dashes to the target enemy unit, and upon arrival she  knocks them back, deals them physical damage, and  slows them by 50% which decays over 1.5 seconds, after which she immediately  leaps back, landing 525 units away from them.

4.concerningText: Active: Quinn  channels for 2 seconds, signaling  Valor to pair up. Upon completion, he picks her up and they unite, increasing her  total movement speed, granting her  ghosting, and allowing her to cast  Skystrike. Behind Enemy Lines can be recast after 0.5 seconds during the channel.

0.concerningText: Active: Quinn signals  Valor to fly forward in a line in the target direction, stopping upon colliding with an enemy unit, dealing physical damage to them and all nearby enemies and applying  nearsight to the primary target for 1.75 seconds.
Passive: Consuming a  Vulnerable mark grants Quinn  bonus attack speed and  bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

Active: Quinn  dashes to the target enemy unit, and upon arrival she  knocks them back, deals them physical damage, and  slows them by 50% which decays over 1.5 seconds, after which she immediately  leaps back, landing 525 units away from them.

Active: Quinn  channels for 2 seconds, signaling  Valor to pair up. Upon completion, he picks her up and they unite, increasing her  total movement speed, granting her  ghosting, and allowing her to cast  Skystrike. Behind Enemy Lines can be recast after 0.5 seconds during the channel.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Cloudburst: Dash to the target location, though not through terrain, and fire three homing missiles at the most wounded enemy within 750 radius of you at the end of the dash, prioritizing enemy champions. Each missile deals 60 − 105 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus AD) magic damage, for a total of 180 − 315 (based on level) (+ 45% bonus AD), increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health) (90 second cooldown; 200 - 425 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – CLOUDBURST:  Dash to the target location, though not through terrain, and fire three homing missiles at the most wounded enemy within 750 radius of you at the end of the dash, prioritizing enemy champions. Each missile deals 60 − 105 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus AD) magic damage, for a total of 180 − 315 (based on level) (+ 45% bonus AD), increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health) (90 second cooldown; 200 - 425 range).

Unique – Sepsis: Dealing physical damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
